name: The Mazed
description:
The MazedPrepare to be a-Mazed

You play as a blue ball just trying to get to your star, but in between you and your goal is slightly smaller green balls. The green balls will set you back to the start of each level, but thats not the only enemy...there are others. The Backer is a small mint colored square that will send you back to the start of the previous level. The Ghost is an enemy that can travel through walls, they leave behind a nasty bit of ghost goo.

The Goal

The goal of the over all game is to beat it, as quickly as possible. Share that time with your friends under all social media using #TheMazedTime It could take you an hour, it could take you 10 minutes, show your friends and I just how good you are. Be warned, The Mazed is a very difficult game.

Features
  • 30 Levels
  • 3 Enemies
    • Green Ball
    • Backer
    • Ghost
  • Timed playthroughs
  • A Challenge
  • Lots of keys
